1.name: Suicide Squad
1.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

2.name: Captain America: Civil War
2.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

3.name: X-Men: Apocalypse
3.description: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

4.name: Independence Day: Resurgence
4.description: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

5.name: The Secret Life of Pets
5.description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

6.name: Zootopia
6.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

7.name: Split
7.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

8.name: Doctor Strange
8.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

9.name: Deadpool
9.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

10.name: The Conjuring 2
10.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising 4 children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

11.name: Sing
11.description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

12.name: Moana
12.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

13.name: Hacksaw Ridge
13.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

14.name: Rogue One
14.description: The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the Death Star plans.

15.name: The Girl on the Train
15.description: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

16.name: Me Before You
16.description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

17.name: The Jungle Book
17.description: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

18.name: Nocturnal Animals
18.description: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

19.name: La La Land
19.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

20.name: Warcraft
20.description: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

21.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
21.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

22.name: The Neon Demon
22.description: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

23.name: Moonlight
23.description: A chronicle of the childhood, adolescence and burgeoning adulthood of a young, African-American, gay man growing up in a rough neighborhood of Miami.

24.name: Kimi no na wa.
24.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

25.name: Terrifier
25.description: A maniacal clown terrorizes three young women on Halloween night and everyone else who stands in his way.

26.name: Lion
26.description: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

27.name: Arrival
27.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

28.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
28.description: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

29.name: The Magnificent Seven
29.description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

30.name: Ghostbusters
30.description: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

31.name: The Legend of Tarzan
31.description: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

32.name: Hidden Figures
32.description: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

33.name: The Nice Guys
33.description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

34.name: Hell or High Water
34.description: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

35.name: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
35.description: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

36.name: Passengers
36.description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

37.name: Don't Breathe
37.description: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

38.name: Dangal
38.description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

39.name: Jason Bourne
39.description: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

40.name: The Lost City of Z
40.description: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Col. Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

41.name: Busanhaeng
41.description: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

42.name: Trolls
42.description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

43.name: The Bad Batch
43.description: In a desert dystopia, a young woman is kidnapped by cannibals.

44.name: Central Intelligence
44.description: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

45.name: The Shallows
45.description: A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.

46.name: Ah-ga-ssi
46.description: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

47.name: The Edge of Seventeen
47.description: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

48.name: Contratiempo
48.description: While the clock is ticking, with the aid of a witness preparation expert, a successful entrepreneur accused of murder has less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defence.

49.name: Grave
49.description: An innocent teenager, studying to be a vet, develops a craving for human flesh.

50.name: American Honey
50.description: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.
